text: Christmas was lovely, nice time to relax with my family. I had a few days out in London. I went to see 'Circus 1903' which was fantastic.
I am now focusing on gaining my work experience placement. Could I send a covering letter and CV to Framestore HR in London? Who would be the best person to address it to?

I am hoping to start the 'Duke of Edinburgh Award' at Bronze level, I signed up to it through school but the teacher then left. Hoping they sort out a replacement teacher soon as I think the experience will help my applications.
Do you know of any free online training around the creative sector or learning related to HR roles that I could do in my spare time?

I went on the access VFX website, apprenticeships section and clicked the arrow to read more about the apprenticeships but it then comes up page not found which is a shame as I would like to know what skills they want.
